metadata.title: Wallnut: WebView Tester
metadata.subtitle: WKWebView DevTools for iOS
metadata.description:
Wallnut is a developer tool for testing and debugging WKWebView configurations on iOS devices.
## Features
**WebView Testing** - Toggle between WKWebView and SFSafariViewController - Real-time configuration changes (JavaScript, cookies, media playback, etc.) - Responsive viewport resizing for testing different screen sizes - Screenshot capture (WKWebView only)
**Built-in DevTools** - Console: Capture JavaScript console.log, warn, error messages - Network: Monitor fetch/XHR requests with timing and response data - Storage: Inspect localStorage, sessionStorage, and cookies - Performance: View Web Vitals (LCP, FID, CLS) and Navigation Timing - Sources: Browse DOM tree, stylesheets, and inline scripts - Accessibility: axe-core based accessibility audit
**Developer Utilities** - API Capability detection (Geolocation, Camera, WebRTC, etc.) - Custom User-Agent configuration - Bookmark management for frequently tested URLs - Info panel with WebView benchmark results
Note: Some Web APIs are restricted in WKWebView due to WebKit security policies and CORS limitations.
## Requirements
- iOS 18.4+ - Device permissions required for Camera, Microphone, and Location API testing
Built for developers who need to test WebView behavior without building a separate test app.
metadata.promotional_text: Test WKWebView configurations and debug web content with built-in DevTools. No Xcode required.
